data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Madeira, Portugal the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Madeira, Portugal
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Madeira.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 28 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Madeira, Portugal that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Madeira, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the South Asian, general people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the South Asian, general people.
Spirit, train the church of Madeira, Portugal to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Madeira, Portugal to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 238,900 people living in Madeira, Portugal. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.
